Description.Name: Assaulted And Killed Pilot.
Description.Details: The day after your eighteen birthday, a discussion turned bad after you stabbed mortally another pilot over a petty affair.

OptionDescription:
As the pressure of mercenary life built on, one day both you and one of your fellow [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreMechWarrior],MechWarriors]] got involved in a violent discussion that turned bad when both of you drew blades and you ended up slicing his throat after a brief confrontation.

With nothing but the bandit king's [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAncestralPhoenixHawk],Phoenix Hawk]] left to call your own, you set off to make a new life for yourself.

+1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGunnery],Gunnery]], +1 [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[StatMechWarriorGuts],Guts]]
BioDescription: Once a promising ex-slave, you murdered one of your lancemates and the merc company expelled you. You took the bandit king's Phoenix Hawk you stole from your former dead master and set off to find a new life to call your own.
